SEARCH
Package main.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
main.game.Game
public class Game extends Object
Class representing the main game logic for the maze exploration game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Maze maze, DoubleLinkedUnorderedList<Player> players, LinkedList<EnigmaData> enigmas, Scanner scanner)
      Constructs a new Game instance with the specified maze, players, enigmas, and scanner.
      Parameters:
      maze - the maze to be explored
      players - the list of players participating in the game
      enigmas - the list of enigmas available in the game
      scanner - the scanner for user input

  • Method Details

    • getChallengeManager

      public ChallengeManager getChallengeManager()
      Gets the challenge manager for the game.
      Returns:
      the challenge manager

    • getAllPlayers

      public DoubleLinkedUnorderedList<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Gets the list of all players in the game.
      Returns:
      the list of all players

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game loop, processing player turns until a winner is found or no players remain.

    • endGame

      public void endGame(Player winner)
      Ends the game and declares the winner.
      Parameters:
      winner - the player who won the game

    • processBlock

      private boolean processBlock(Player active)
      Processes if the active player is blocked from playing this turn.
      Parameters:
      active - the active player
      Returns:
      true if the player is blocked and the turn is skipped, false otherwise

    • executePlay

      private void executePlay(Player active)
      Executes the play for the active player.
      Parameters:
      active - the active player

    • swapAllPlayerPositions

      public void swapAllPlayerPositions()
      Swaps the positions of all players in the game randomly. This method is used during the GENERAL_SWAP random event.

    • chooseRandomPlayer

      public Player chooseRandomPlayer(Player exclusion)
      Chooses a random player from the list of all players, excluding the specified player. It is used to select a player to change positions with during certain random events.
      Parameters:
      exclusion - the player to exclude from selection
      Returns:
      a randomly selected player, or null if no other players are available

    • getHallToDestination

      private Hall getHallToDestination(Room origin, Room destination)
      Retrieves the hall connecting the origin room to the destination room.
      Parameters:
      origin - the starting room
      destination - the target room
      Returns:
      the hall connecting the two rooms, or null if none exists

    • getMaze

      public Maze getMaze()
      Gets the maze being explored in the game.
      Returns:
      the maze

    • addPlayers

      public void addPlayers(ArrayUnorderedList<Player> players)
      Adds players to the game, assigning them starting positions in entrance rooms.
      Parameters:
      players - the list of players to add

    • displayGameStateNarrative

      private void displayGameStateNarrative(Player activePlayer)
      Displays the current game state in a narrative format for the active player. Includes player statuses, positions, and active effects. Is presented at the start of each player's turn and provides context for decision-making. The narrative includes: - Turn number and active player - Each player's name, starting position, current position, and history of actions - Any active effects or challenges pending for each player
      Parameters:
      activePlayer - the player whose turn it is
